name: Rolair 9 Hp Honda, 20.1 Cfm@90Psi, 20 Gallon Compressor
short_description: Powerful Performance: 9 HP Honda engine delivers fast and efficient air pressurization, perfect for industrial applications
Large Air Reserve: 20-gallon ASME tank holds plenty of air for your most demanding tasks
High Airflow: Produces 20.1 CFM at 90 PSI, powering multiple pneumatic tools simultaneously
Fuel Efficient: Automatic idle-down feature saves fuel during stop-and-go jobs
Durable Construction: Heavy-duty tires and alloy steel material ensure longevity and easy maneuverability
product_description: The ROLAIR 9-Horsepower Air Compressor delivers powerful performance for industrial applications. The compressor boasts a 9-horsepower Honda engine for fast, efficient pressurization. Its tank holds 20 gallons of air in reserve for your most intense tasks. It delivers more than 20 cubic feet per minute (CFM) at 90 pounds per square inch (PSI) and creates enough pressure for your toughest industrial tasks. When idle, the engine automatically adjusts to accommodate the lower power requirements and saves fuel during stop-and-go jobs. It also protects itself against serious issues by shutting down when oil levels drop too low. The heavy-duty air compressor includes a belt tightener to adjust performance and durable tires to help move it from place to place. Rolair 9-Horsepower air compressor includes ASME tank, belt tightener and tires 9-horsepower Honda engine pressurizes air quickly and efficiently Heavy-duty air compressor's ASME tank holds 20 gallons of air in reserve Rolair compressor delivers 20.1 CFM at 90 PSI for multiple pneumatic devices Automatic idle adjustments save fuel between tasks Automatic shutdown protects 20-gallon compressor from low oil levels Belt tightener adjusts performance in seconds Tires roll around over many different terrains 12-month manufacturer's warranty from date of purchase or 18 months from date of production; Made in USA

Maximum Operating Pressure ‎90 Pound per Square Inch

It’s also equipped with dual pressure gauges and two industrial "Push to Connect" quick connectors for enhanced usability and efficiency. At California Air Tools, we pride ourselves on delivering innovative, top-tier technology in air compressors that meet the needs of both professionals and hobbyists without compromising on power or user-friendliness. Elevate your workspace with the California Air Tools Ultra Quiet, Oil-Free and Powerful 2.0 Hp Portable 20-Gallon Air Compressor. name: 20 Gallon Workshop Air Compressor,150 PSI Max, Oil-Free Vertical Compressor for Garage&Home, with a Long-Life Brushless Motor for Carpentry,Nailing, Auto Repair,Painting(4-Piece Tool Bundle)
short_description: 【Brushless Motor & Lower Noise Operation】 Say goodbye to the high-frequency whine of traditional brushed motors. Our advanced brushless motor significantly reduces noise, eliminates the need to replace carbon brushes or belts, and provides a stable, consistent speed. This cutting-edge technology dramatically extends the lifespan of your air compressor.

【Oil-Free, Maintenance-Free Design】 Forget messy oil changes and routine upkeep. This oil-free design not only saves you from maintenance headaches but also promotes a cleaner, greener work environment by preventing oil mist and harmful emissions from being released into the atmosphere.

【High-Performance 150 PSI】 Power a wide range of pneumatic tools with an adjustable pressure range from 0 to a maximum of 150 PSI. Delivering a robust 3.9 SCFM at 90 PSI, this compressor offers rapid recovery times to keep you working efficiently.

【Advanced Safety Protection】 Your safety is our priority. The machine is equipped with multiple safety features, including an overload protector that automatically shuts down the unit during a current overload, a thermal protector that pauses the machine if the motor overheats, and a pressure relief valve that will safely vent excess pressure if it exceeds the tank's limit.
【WHAT YOU GET】 One durable, long-life 20-gallon Vertical air compressor featuring a maintenance-free brushless motor, designed for years of reliable service.
